name: "Luna's Awakening " Action Plataform Godot
description:
For best viewing put in fullscreen Controls: D - attack and combo attack

C - Stats

I - inventory

E - interact

Key arrows - move

Space - Jump

R - Special 1

G - Throw Sword

Shift - Dash

Esc - pause Has partial configuration for joystick Gameplay Save and load system   inventory and status system  level and experience system  enemy drop system (potion hp, mp and equipment)   REMEMBERING, IT'S JUST A DEMO, ANY MISTAKE, PLEASE PLEASE GIVE ME FEEDBACK  This game is a project I've been working on for about a month my first game, learning everything from 0,   I hope you like this demo,  I welcome comments and ideas As I evolve and create more things I will post updates patches with bug fixes and new content THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT ! I hope you enjoy!
